248633.「おや 帰っちゃうのかぁ？\n また来いよなぁ！\n ヒヒヒッ！\n<end>:
Oh, you're leeeaving? Well, come again!
Heheheee!
<end>

248635.「やれやれ <%sM_floor>まで到達したのに\n やられちまったかぁ。\n:
Jeez... You only made it to the <%sM_floor> and got yourself beat?
By the way, you scored... <%dM_score> points.
Try harder and be a little more entertaining next time! Heheheee!

248636.「どうぐかばんが いっぱいのようだな。\n 報酬は いったん あずかっておいてや:
Seems like your item bag's full. I'll give
you your reward once you make some space
in your bag.

248637.「これが 褒美の一覧だ！\n 現在のハイスコアの合計に 応じて\n イカした 報:
This is the list of rewards! I'll reward ya
based on your current total high score.
<break>

248638.「今後も お前には 期待しているぜ。\n それじゃ また 来てくれよなぁ！\n<:
<speed=0>I look forward to seeing more of you
in the future!
<end>

248639.「……お！\n 報酬が得られる スコアまで\n どうやら 到達しているぞ！\n<:
...Oh! Looks like ya hit a score reward!
<bw_break>

248643.「万魔の塔ではハイスコアの\n 合計に応じて 報酬を獲得できるぞ。\n<br>\:
Here in Banma Tower, you get rewarded based on your total high score.
Rewards reset every Sunday at 6 a.m. (JST). Don't forget that!

248644.「万魔の塔では 俺が渡すどうぐしか\n 使うことはできないぞ。\n<br>\n「:
In the Banma Tower, you can only use items that I give to ya.
You can't use your own item bag, either. Hey, what's with that face?
I'll place items around the platform for ya.
If you want to use them, pick them up and they'll be placed into the item bag I gave you.

248646.「魔物を倒すと ポイントを稼げるから\n そのポイントの合計を スコアとして\n:
When you defeat a demon, you earn points, and I'll record the total of those points as your score. And if you get a new high score, we'll
add it to your high score total. Your high score total resets at 6 a.m. on Sunday morning, so be careful.

248653.「さあ どこまで行けるかな？\n 万魔に挑みし者よ。\n がんばってなー！ ヒヒ:
Now, how far will you go? Let's see how far
you can go. Good luck! Hee-hee!<end>

248657.「なになに？ \n そんなもんは いらねーって！？\n<br>\n「まあ いいけ: What? You don't want that? Oh, well... I'll make sure you can always see the rules, so if you change your mind...

248658.「そうかそうか 歓迎するぜ～。\n それじゃ さっそく\n ルール説明を始めるぞ:
I see, I got it... Welcome!
I'll begin with an explanation of the rules.
Hee hee hee!
<bw_break>

249152.「お前は パーティを組んでるから\n パーティメンバーと一緒に\n 参加してもら:
Now, you're in a party, so if you'd like to join in with the other party members... You tell the party leader to call me and announce
your participation. That way, the party leader will send you an invitation to the Tower of 10,000 Demons.

249154.「<%dM_point>ポイントに\n 到達したようだな！\n <%sM_ite:
Hey, you reached <%dM_point> points!
Take these <%dM_num2> <%sM_item>!
<end>

249155.「<%dM_point>ポイントに\n 到達したようだな！\n <%sM_ite:
Hey, you reached <%dM_point> points!
Take this <%sM_item>!
<end>

249177.「あん？ <%sM_banma>から \n 逃げ帰ってきたのか……。 \n<br:
Hmm? You've escaped from the <%sM_banma>,
I see... Well, it's fine. I'll still count
the points ya earned.
<end>

249178.「ほう <%sM_banma>を\n 制覇したのか！ \n<br>\n「なかなか: So you've conquered <%sM_banma>! That's quite a feat! It looks like you have some skill!

250627.「魔界の海に漂う 魔瘴のチカラが溜まったな。\n また多くの魔物たちが 作りださ:
The demon miasma flowing in the Demon World's seas... its power has accumulated and created more monsters! Your score has also reset!
I also took away your Gilam Magic and reset your Gilam Souls. Hee hee hee!

250629.「報酬は 全て\n 受け取りきっているが\n <%sM_banma>に 挑戦する:
You've received all your rewards, but do you
want to try <%sM_banma>?<yesno><break>

250986.「なんと <%sM_banma>を\n 完全制覇したのか！ \n めっちゃ つぇ:
You've conquered <%sM_banma>! That's so awesome! I was hoping you'd do it someday... I never thought I'd see the day
when you'd beat 'em all... I can't even contain my excitement! Hee hee!

250987.「おい ちょっと待て。\n まだ 受け取れる報酬が あるぞ！\n<bw_brea:
Hey, wait a sec! You still have rewards left!
<bw_break>

250988.「おやぁ？\n 受け取っていない\n 報酬が あるじゃねーか。\n<bw_bre:
Huh? Looks like there's rewards ya still
haven't gotten.<bw_break>

251011.「ヒヒヒッ！ よく来たな\n ここが 万魔の塔だ！\n なかなか イカした とこ:
Hehehee! Welcome, welcome! This is the Banma Tower! It's pretty cool, don'tcha think?
It's in shambles now, but... it used to be a flourishing temple of entertainment, founded by a great demon king.
The Banma Tower creates monsters from the demon miasma that blends into the sea of the Demon World.
It was once a place where slaves and criminals were thrown into, and those who won, won their freedom.
The great demon king and his entourage enjoyed a nightly feast while watching these "shows" of entertainment...
At some point, this "show" became known as the "Feast of Calamity".
I'm just enjoying myself watching these skilled monsters fight and destroy each other. Heheheee!
If you can defeat the waves of calamity that come at you and win, I'll give ya something cool!
...and the stage for this amazing feast is a floating battlefield called the Calamity Platform!
Once you're on the platform, the battle will begin. But before that, do you wanna hear the rules for the Banma Tower?
If you don't wanna listen to the rules, you can still go to the Banma Tower right away if that floats your boat.
We're talking life and death here. I think it's a good idea if you listen to the rules. Well? What do ya say?

252090.「なんと <%sM_banma>を\n 完全制覇したのか！ \n めっちゃ つぇ:
You've conquered <%sM_banma>! That's so awesome! I was hoping you'd do it someday... I never thought I'd see the day
when you'd beat 'em all... I can't even contain my excitement! Hee hee!

252094.「よーし！ 報酬は以上だ。\n<br>\n「今後も お前には 期待しているぜ。\:
All right! Your reward... I'll keep my eye on
you. Well then, come again!<end>

252095.「よーし！ 報酬は以上だ。\n<br>\n「まさか 完全制覇する\n ヤツが現れ:
All right! The reward... I never thought I'd see the day when someone would conquer all of them. I'll live long enough... But you're not
that powerful... You'll have to keep entertaining me! Hee-hee!

252096.「よーし！ 報酬は以上だ。\n<br>\n「次回はもっと がんばってくれても\n:
All right! The reward is... You can try
harder next time... Well then, come again!<end>

252097.「それにしても 完全制覇する\n ヤツが現れるとはな……。\n 長生きもしてみる:
I never thought I'd see the day when he'd conquer all of them. I'll try to live long enough... But your power isn't like that...
You'll have to keep me entertained for even longer! Hee-hee!

252098.「次回はもっと がんばってくれても\n いいんだぜ～\n<br>\n それじゃ:
You can do better next time~ Then come back
again!<end>

252758.「万魔の塔では 俺が渡すどうぐしか\n 使うことは できないぞ。\n<br>\n:
In the Tower of 10,000 Demons, you can only use the tools I give you... You'll have to use your own special bag... What? You can't
just... Even if we're fighting, I'll drop the potion on the altar... I'll drop the potion on the platform. I'll just need to get it out
of my toolbox...

252984.「戦闘中の お前のはたらき次第で\n ボーナスがあるぞ。\n 具体的に 何を評価:
The bonuses are based on how well you perform in combat. Specifically, what do they look for? You kill a certain number of demons...
Or the total damage you deal... There's more. I'll see what I can find...

252986.「災壇にいる 大量の魔物たちの中に\n オーラを まとった魔物が\n 出現するこ:
In the midst of the mass of demons on the platform, a demon with an aura will appear. If you defeat this special demon, your score
will be multiplied... A time limit will be added... There are many positive effects for you. You've got to be brave and go for it!
And don't overlook this one.

259735.「俺様の マジックをご所望か？\n どれにするんだ～？\n<break>:
Would you like some of my magic? Which one do
you want?<break>

259736.「<%sM_banma_buff>か。\n ギラムソウル <%dM_giramu:
<%sM_banma_buff>?  That'll be
<%dM_giramu_coin> Gilam Souls.
This is the magic you want?
<yesno2><break>

259737.「おいおい ギラムソウルが\n 足りねーぞぉ。\n<bw_break>: Oh, come on. We need more Gillum souls...<bw_break>

259879.「災壇から生きて帰ってこれたなら\n スコアに 応じて俺様から\n ギラムソウル:
If you make it back from the platform alive, I'll reward you with a Gillum Soul for every point you score! For every 1,000 points you
score, I'll give you one Gillum Soul! This is the beautiful crystal that was formed from my soul's surge when I saw the challenger's
struggle for life! Hee-hee! ... You don't look happy at all... Well... The Gye'ram Soul can only be used in the Tower of 10,000
Demons, but it's not just a souvenir. Spend a Gillum Soul and I'll give you my special magic that only powers up the tower!
Furthermore, Gillum Souls can be exchanged for items... How sweet of me to create such a service. Don't get too attached to the big
bowl. But... But the Gye'ram-souls you've earned will be reset at 6:00 a.m. on Sunday... Hee-hee!

259880.「ギラムマジックは ギラムソウルを消費して \n おまえを パワーアップさせる\:
Gillam's magic uses Gillam souls to power you up with some pretty cool stuff. And just so you know... this is the kind of thing a
greedy bastard like you would do... You can only cast one type of Gillum magic... You can't cast more than one, so... And Gillam's
magic is on you. And while you're at it, cast it on any companions you might have. My wonderful magic only works in the Tower of
10,000 Demons, but the next week it doesn't work at all. In other words, I can reset it at 6 a.m. on Sunday morning... Hee-hee!

259881.「ああ そうだ。 忘れねーうちに\n 褒美の ギラムソウルを 渡しとくぜぇ～。\:
Oh, right. I'll give you your Gilam Souls
before I forget. Hee hee!<bw_break>

259932.「<%sM_banma_buff>か。\n 今は他の ギラムマジックが かかって: <%sM_banma_buff>? There's some other Gillum magic going on right now, but I can override it, right?

259933.「ほぉ～ いらんのか？\n 後悔しても しらねーからな～。\n<bw_break:

260087.「今 お前に 俺様のマジックは\n かかってねーぞ。\n<bw_break>: I've cast my magic upon you!<bw_break>

260089.「おい うっかりさん。\n ギラムマジックは\n さっき かけたぞ～。\n<bw: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Gillum's magic was just...<bw_break>

260914.「あー 今回のスコアでは\n ギラムソウルは やれんな～。\n<bw_break: Uh, with this score, Gillum-soul can't...<bw_break>

296976.「魔界の海に漂う 魔瘴のチカラが溜まったな。\n また多くの魔物たちが 作りださ:
The power of demon miasma drifting in the sea of Demon World has been accumulated. More monsters have been created! Now, reset the
score. And I'll reset my magic and Gilam souls too~ Be careful. Hee-hee-hee! Hmm? What is it? You got a letter? What is it... Banma Tower is
going to start the "Manma Fever" from today? The period is from yearmonthday
hourminute to yearmonthdayho ur minute. nM_TIME2>minutes.
Ummm...so....during this time period, we should try to increase the variety of Items that can be redeemed with Gilam Souls. I see.
I sense something powerful here. I'll follow your orders. So, starting today, I'll allow you to exchange my treasured Items. You should
be grateful!
